product_desc:
Microsoft Dynamics AX

Dynamics is key!
We use ERP systems based on Microsoft Dynamics AX for Retail and Dynamics NAV to develop future-proof, varied and efficient solutions for the retail sector.

We speak retail!
As an international Microsoft Dynamics partner, we draw on our experience implementing more than 850 projects to help medium-sized and large companies in the retail sector integrate efficient ERP systems. Count on us for the implementation of secure and flexible multi-channel software and competent ERP consultation today and in the future.

Clients: 
Jack Wolfskin, Obi, KIND, Kaiser+Kraft, Adidas, ...
high_concept: We integrate ERP systems in multi-channel retailing companies
name: impuls winning solutions
